content: Dear Atheist What is your opinion on religion being merely private? We have people stating they believe in a personal god although they consider themselves as Christians, Muslims, Jews etc. which seems like a contradiction to me. How can the statement of religion merely be a part of private life when there's a church in every little commune?  Should religion be completely eradicated or should we let these dangerous beliefs stay a part of social interaction?
